title: hari hari hari yani
sahitya:
hari hari hariyani smaraNa jEsitE duritamu mAnunE O manasA

anupallavi

 parama puruSuDaina bhAva janakuni paripUrNamagu bhakti sEyucunu shrI

caraNam

 rAma bhakta varulanu dUSincaka rAtri pagalu yara nimiSamE mAraka 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata bhAvitamagu shrI
